abstract: The chairwoman of the Federal Trade Commission is expected to resign her post next month, according to people briefed on her plans.
snippet: The chairwoman of the Federal Trade Commission is expected to resign her post next month, according to people briefed on her plans.
lead_paragraph: The chairwoman of the Federal Trade Commission is expected to resign her post next month to take a senior position at Procter & Gamble, according to people briefed on her plans.

headline.main: Top F.T.C. Official Expected to Resign
headline.print_headline: Top F.T.C. Official Expected to Resign

abstract: The chairwoman of the Federal Trade Commission is expected to resign her post next month to take a senior position at Procter & Gamble, according to press reports.
lead_paragraph: The chairwoman of the Federal Trade Commission is expected to resign her post next month to take a senior position at Procter & Gamble, according to press reports.
